info.name: SRB2 MS Mirror Consistency Patch
info.description: Changes James' nicely written SRB2 Master Server mirror to look more consistent with my (awful hacky stupid mess of a) SRB2 Message Board fix.
info.additionalInfo:
V1:
- Padding and coloration changes
- Tables with terrible rounded corners
- Slightly widened website

V2:
- Themed the rest of James' website lol

V3: 
- Small fixes
